References.Title: Augmenting the National Institutes of Health Chest Radiograph Dataset with expert annotations of possible pneumonia

Datasets.Name: RSNA 2018 Pneumonia Detection Challenge
Datasets.Labeling: 18 radiologists from 16 different institutions, including 12 chest radiologists from the STR, Mean of 10.6 years of experience (age range, 3-35 years), Scope of annotation (e.g., multi-institutional)
Datasets.Confidentiality: Manual review of images to exclude PHI

Training.Comments: 30,000 frontal view chest radiographs from the 112,000-image public National Institutes of Health (NIH) CXR8 dataset: 16,248 posteroanterior views, 13,752 anteroposterior views
